thread.title: Senior Business Analyst - USA-NY-New York City
thread.title_full: Senior Business Analyst - USA-NY-New York City

title: Senior Business Analyst - USA-NY-New York City
text:
Navint Partners is looking for consultants for the following position: 
Senior Business Analyst (New York City) 
We are looking for a Senior Business Analyst with commercial banking experience for a contract assignment in midtown Manhattan. The Senior Business Analyst will translate information technology and banking requirements into clear, concise system/data requirements and process designs. 
For a full description of this role and the required qualifications please go to www.joinnavint.com. Company info Navint Partners 
Company Profile Navint Partners is a different kind of management consulting firm, blending our unique industry experience and innovative thinking to address clients' business challenges in imaginative ways. We advise C-Suite executives on actionable recommendations to solve their business challenges. Navint offers a comprehensive portfolio of professional services and solutions. From business model evolution to software solutions, our services and products are organized around our three primary disciplines- strategy, operations and technology, to help our clients achieve their Business Integration objectives. Visit us at www.navint.com or view our current openings at www.joinnavint.com Employer job
